TopicTitle: Does it possible to send stock Two-Stage lander into orbit without crew

Articles.Content:
I mean i knew it possible because i send space station without crew by putting it on top of unnamed probe.

It would be cool if we can send manned crew without crew.

I build craft capable reaching but it is one small problem it no have lender, I invented that i can send capsule into orbit and than send munar module on separate smaller rocket, and than using last stage of my capsule rocket to send both craft to Mun

But i need to send Munar module without crew

Sure. Just build your Munar Module rocket starting with a probe body. It will appear on the pad unmanned.

Edited April 23, 2013 by Brotoro

Sure. Just build your Munar Module rocket starting with a probe body. It will appear on the pad unmanned.

Thanks, I heard that America and Soviets considering sending man to moon using two rocket one for capsule with boater that send capsule and lander witch was be launched in separate rocket, but NASA decided to send both craft in one rocket.
